title: Bug 50793: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
description: When a ServletRequestListener is defined, it is expected that when invoked after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest should be ASYNC. However, in this case, the DispatcherType is incorrectly returned as REQUEST instead. This is a bug.
OB: After a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest should be ASYNC, but it is incorrectly returned as REQUEST.
EB: The DispatcherType should be returned as ASYNC instead of REQUEST after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch().
SR: Update the implementation of the ServletRequestListener to ensure that the correct DispatcherType, ASYNC, is returned after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch().
